name: 黃增隆
objective:
隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，如何處理與儲存大數據，並探勘有用的知識是企業成功關鍵。本課程內容包括決策理論之基本觀念、如何處理與分析大數據、以及如何更進一步從大數據分析連接在真實世界裡相關決策問題應用。
With the development of cloud computing services and internet services, the ability to store big data and transform into applicable knowledge is critical. This course includes an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory, and how to handle and process big data with applications on the real-world decision problems.
